text: Svetlana Pankratova (born April 29, 1971) is a Russian citizen who holds the record for world's longest legs on a female body 4 feet 4 inches. Her height is 6 feet 5 inches. Pankratova was born on April 29, 1971 in Volgograd, Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic, USSR. She studied at Virginia Commonwealth University. She now lives in London, England. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Volgograd Oblast Category:World record holders Category:Volgograd
title: Svetlana Pankratova
